Dialogue.Page: This area showcases some of the anticipated mods currently being developed by the community.

While these mods haven’t been released yet, that doesn’t mean there isn’t anything to say about them! Developers making larger-scale mods will often post teasers about them, or even create dedicated threads under the nh-addons channel of the modding discord!
If you want to, you can meet the creators of these mods at the party on the north pole!
